name: iAsync.async
summary: iAsync.async lib developed to make async programming easier
description:
iAsync is a set of IOS libraries that aims to make asychronous programming easy for for IOS developers. It uses functional programming ideas to solve Callback Hell problem.

                   * google group : https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/iasync-users
